claims.claim: AI models approve 27% more borrowers than traditional credit models
claims.quote: More than 620,000 of them were approved by Upstart's models to get a total $7.8 billion in personal loans so far, about 27 percent more than would've been approved by traditional credit models

claims.claim: AI models offer interest rates 16% below average
claims.quote: at interest rates 16 percent below average, according to a study from the U.S. Consumer Financial Protection Bureau

claims.claim: Approval rates nearly doubled overnight with first AI model experiment
claims.quote: Overnight our approval rates nearly doubled … and over time it became clear we were actually moving the needle in improving access to credit

claims.claim: GPU implementation reduced model testing time by factor of five
claims.quote: At one point, these comparisons took more than a day to run on a CPU, but our research found we could cut that down by a factor of five by porting the work to GPUs

claims.claim: Model training and evaluation time reduced from days to hours
claims.quote: These days, Upstart trains and evaluates new machine-learning models in a few hours instead of days
In 2021, the company's revenue was up 264% year-over-year, with a net income of $135.44 million
the company's revenue amounted to $127.63 million in the quarter that ended June 2024, beating analysts' estimates of $124.53 million
For the first half of 2024, its revenue increased 7% year-over-year to $255.42 million

claims.claim: 31% increase in loan transactions in Q2 2024
claims.quote: UPST saw a 31% increase in loan transactions, reaching about 144,000 loans and welcoming over 89,000 new borrowers

claims.claim: 91% of core unsecured loans fully automated in Q2 2024
claims.quote: 91% of their core unsecured loans in Q2 were fully automated, which means no documents, phone calls, or human involvement is required

claims.claim: Upstart has facilitated nearly $40B in loans over ten years
claims.quote: Over ten years, Upstart has facilitated nearly $40B in loans for its lending partners to over 3 million American consumers

claims.claim: AI models separate risk 3-6x better than traditional methods
claims.quote: By using vast datasets, Upstart's models separate risk 3-6x better than traditional methods

claims.claim: 90% of Upstart-powered loans processed without human intervention
claims.quote: In fact, 90 percent of Upstart-powered loans are processed without human intervention, showcasing the potential of AI to streamline operations

claims.claim: Upstart approves 101% more applicants than traditional methods
claims.quote: Upstart approves 101 percent more applicants than traditional methods, also extending 38 percent lower APRs to qualified individuals

claims.claim: Upstart extends 38% lower APRs to qualified individuals
claims.quote: Upstart approves 101 percent more applicants than traditional methods, also extending 38 percent lower APRs to qualified individuals
